医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
运动员脑震荡诊断的一个有希望的视觉标志研究人员调查了运动事件后自发摇头（SHAAKE）如何成为诊断脑震荡的新征兆。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/A-promising-visual-sign-for-concussion-diagnosis-in-athletes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/A-promising-visual-sign-for-concussion-diagnosis-in-athletes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=943d05e9-0637-4975-a021-d059257335b7 Mon, 28 Oct 2024 13:04:00 -0400 A promising visual sign for concussion diagnosis in athletes
遗传学和儿童注意力问题与青少年精神病样经历有关加州大学洛杉矶分校健康中心的研究人员发现，一个人出现类似精神病经历的风险可能受到童年注意力问题及其基因构成的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Genetics-and-childhood-attention-problems-linked-to-psychotic-like-experiences-in-youth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Genetics-and-childhood-attention-problems-linked-to-psychotic-like-experiences-in-youth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=acaed82a-04aa-4a64-92e5-3ca3bb5ea23a Mon, 28 Oct 2024 11:53:14 -0400 Genetics and childhood attention problems linked to psychotic-like experiences in youth
加州大学圣地亚哥分校获得 800 万美元资助，用于研究物质使用障碍的遗传学加州大学圣地亚哥分校医学院获得国家药物滥用研究所 (NIDA) 为期五年、价值 800 万美元的资助，用于研究物质使用障碍的遗传学。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/UC-San-Diego-receives-248-million-grant-to-study-the-genics-of-substance-use-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/UC-San-Diego-receives-248-million-grant-to-study-the-genics-of-substance-use-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c6856b24-cb8e-4586-80c9-585f845f1600 Mon, 28 Oct 2024 11:39:40 -0400 UC San Diego receives $8 million grant to study the genetics of substance use disorder
阿尔茨海默病协会内部：Heather Snyder 博士谈推动研究与合作希瑟·斯奈德 (Heather Snyder) 讨论了阿尔茨海默病协会的研究计划、诊断方面的突破以及痴呆症护理领域合作的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Inside-the-Alzheimers-Association-Dr-Heather-Snyder-on-Driving-Research-and-Collaboration.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Inside-the-Alzheimers-Association-Dr-Heather-Snyder-on-Driving-Research-and-Collaboration.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=600ac07c-caba-4b41-a29e-464ef2ce9d00 Mon, 28 Oct 2024 09:41:00 -0400 Inside the Alzheimer's Association: Dr. Heather Snyder on Driving Research and Collaboration
儿童体重指数异常与肺功能受损有关卡罗林斯卡学院的研究人员报告说，儿童体重指数异常（无论高还是低）现在可能与肺功能受损有关，但如果他们的体重指数在成年前恢复正常，这种损害就可以得到抵消。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Abnormal-BMI-in-children-linked-to-impaired-lung-function.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Abnormal-BMI-in-children-linked-to-impaired-lung-function.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c88102af-f1ea-4f7c-858f-509bd2177c03 Mon, 28 Oct 2024 09:37:00 -0400 Abnormal BMI in children linked to impaired lung function
快速除颤器电击对于心脏骤停的生存至关重要众所周知，在发生心脏骤停时迅速采取行动很重要，但是使用除颤器进行快速初始电击对于患者的生存机会到底意味着什么呢？阿姆斯特丹 UMC 的研究人员分析了 3723 名在医院外发生心脏骤停的患者的数据，得出的结论是，对于第一次电击，每分钟生存机会就会减少 6%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Amsterdam-UMC-Study-Proves-Impact-Of-Rapid-First-Shock-After-Cardiac-Arrest.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Amsterdam-UMC-Study-Proves-Impact-Of-Rapid-First-Shock-After-Cardiac-Arrest.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eb8b8b42-b8ef-4c63-967f-37fef875ef1a Mon, 28 Oct 2024 09:30:12 -0400 Quick defibrillator shocks critical for cardiac arrest survival
炎症性肠病与脊柱关节炎之间的联系被发现炎症性肠病 (IBD) 与脊柱关节炎（一种导致关节疼痛和僵硬的疾病）之间存在密切联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Link- Between-itis-bowel-disease-and-spondyloarthritis-revealed.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Link- Between-itis-bowel-disease-and-spondyloarthritis-revealed.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c38cd16a-edca-4983-bd34-a371e3b80c20 Mon, 28 Oct 2024 07:46:13 -0400 Link between inflammatory bowel disease and spondyloarthritis revealed

二十年来瑞典心力衰竭死亡率下降卡罗林斯卡学院的一项新研究表明，过去 20 年来瑞典心力衰竭死亡率有所下降。该研究已发表在《欧洲心力衰竭杂志》上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Heart-failure-mortality-declines-in-Sweden-over-two-decades.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Heart-failure-mortality-declines-in-Sweden-over-two-decades.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=73cd4da9-f9f0-4ef2-8d11-2a25450547ec Mon, 28 Oct 2024 07:21:49 -0400 Heart failure mortality declines in Sweden over two decades
Bedfont® Scientific Limited 举办富有洞察力的小组讨论以表彰 Stoptober Stoptober 每年十月在英国举行。该活动鼓励吸烟者戒烟 28 天。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Bedfontc2ae-Scientific-Limited-Host-an-Insightful-Panel-Discussion-in-Recognition-of-Stoptober.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Bedfontc2ae-Scientific-Limited-Host-an-Insightful-Panel-Discussion-in-Recognition-of-Stoptober.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dc9799c7-d210-4ba5-b8dd-ae59e340e3bb Mon, 28 Oct 2024 07:09:00 -0400 Bedfont® Scientific Limited Host an Insightful Panel Discussion in Recognition of Stoptober
